thread.title: DestinaTour Unveils Exciting Tour Offers (Ishara Keerthirathna)
thread.title_full: DestinaTour Unveils Exciting Tour Offers (Ishara Keerthirathna)

title: DestinaTour Unveils Exciting Tour Offers (Ishara Keerthirathna)
text: By Ishara Keerthirathna Oct 13, 2015 DestinaTour, a renowned travel agency has now offered a private tour with experienced, very well educated and fun driver/guide who is very flexible and can customize the tour as the guests wish.For us, the main goal is for you to be satisfied and not only to see and learn about Croatia and Slovenia but to have a lot of fun while exploring it.Croatia has finally been getting its due as a much sought after tourist destination. The stunning country is filled with many architectural marvels, gems of Nature and has a fun loving vibe, which ensures that it has something for all types of travelers. The same is true for Slovenia, which is gaining in prominence amongst holidaymakers.With DestinaTour you'll get the great service of Private guided tour, flexibility of customization, insider tips... different tour packages that can hit the right notes with travelers who want to visit Croatia and do exactly the things they want.For travelers who don't have the luxury of time, we organize one day trips that are packed with activities that will give them the true feel of the place. Others can make the most out of one or two week long tours in Croatia and Slovenia. Right from the stunning Plitvice lakes, there is a lot in store for travelers in these tours.DestinaTour offers completely personalized private tour with experienced professional tour guides who are fluent in English for the convenience of its clients. Another advantage is booking with the company that promises affordable rates too.About DestinaTourIt is a travel agency that offers day trips and long tours to Croatia and Slovenia, ensuring that its clients get the experience of their lives. Mediterranean's finest await you! We provide an exquisite luxury travel tourism experience in Croatia and Slovenia for your leisure and pleasure!Media Contact
